6210.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Third parties may be involved in operating the service
tosdr.tldr: According to a reddit comment by one of the privacytools.io admins, Mastodon hosted on social.privacytools.io is being hosted by a third-party provider, https://masto.host,

6379.quoteText: The company reserves the right to change, redact, and delete content on the forum for any reason.
6379.title: The service can change, redact, and delete specific content without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: The service can delete specific content without reason and may do it without prior notice
tosdr.tldr: On the privacytoolsIO forums, the service reserves the right to change, redact, and delete content on the forum for any reason.

6380.quoteText: You may not automate access to the forum, or monitor the forum, such as with a web crawler, browser plug-in or add-on, or other computer program that is not a web browser.
